wordpressPost.title: KDE 4.0
wordpressPost.content: It is true that KDE 4.0 is still a fair bit away from being a reality but there has been much hype surrounding it and a lot of speculation has been put into what the end result might look like. This looks like one of the first reliable pieces of information about it, which explains the most prominent differences well.
